tuv.seg: Day centres and day care
Ionaid lae agus cúram lae
Day centres or day care centres in Ireland provide a range of social and rehabilitative services for older people and people with disabilities
Cuireann ionaid lae nó ionaid chúram lae réimse seirbhísí sóisialta agus athshlánaithe ar fáil do dhaoine níos sine agus do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas

Day centres include centres that provide day activation, such as recreational, sport and leisure facilities, and specialised clinic facilities that provide a combination of medical and rehabilitation services

Cuirtear san áireamh mar ionaid lae ionaid a chuireann imeachtaí lae ar fáil, mar shampla áiseanna siamsaíochta, spóirt agus scíthe agus áiseanna sainchúram clinic a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí leighis agus athshlánaithe lena chéile
Day centres are provided on a variable basis throughout the country, some being provided directly by the Health Service Executive (HSE) and others in conjunction with voluntary organisations

Níl seirbhísí Ionaid Lae curtha ar fáil ar an mbealach céanna ar fud na tíre, is é Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhís Sláinte (FSS) a chuireann cuid acu ar fáil go díreach agus cuid eile cuirtear ar fáil iad i gcomhar le heagraíochtaí deonacha
Day centres providing medical care are less widely available
Níl an oiread sin ionaid lae ann a bhfuil cúram leighis le fáil iontu
Access to day centres is by referral and the eligibility conditions vary from area to area with means tests applying in some cases

Ní mór don dochtúir/banaltra duine a chur ar aghaidh le seirbhísí ionaid lae a fháil agus ní mar a chéile atá na rialacha i ngach ceantar a bhaineann le bheith i dteideal áite sna hionaid agus bíonn scrúdú maoine le sásamh i roinnt cásanna
There are no clear-cut rules about day centres
Níl aon rialacha géara leagtha síos do na hionaid lae
In practice, day centres have evolved as an alternative to hospital or other residential care for older people and people with disabilities
Is ionaid iad a chuireann cúram ar fáil do dhaoine níos sine agus do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas taobh amuigh de na hospidéil agus ionaid chúraim chónaithe eile
Their general purpose is to help older people, people with disabilities, and their carers, to live in their communities and to promote independent living

Tá sé mar aidhm ghinearálta acu cúnamh a chur ar fáil do dhaoine níos sine, do dhaoine atá faoi mhíchumas agus dá gcúramóirí le go mbeidh siad in ann cónaí ina bpobal agus maireachtáil go neamhspléach
The range of services available varies widely and can include any or all of the following:
Tá difríocht mhór sa réimse seirbhísí a chuirtear ar fáil ó áit go háit agus bíonn cuid de na seirbhísí seo i gceist nó iad ar fad:
• Transport to and from day centres
• Córas iompair chuig agus ó na hionaid lae
• Social skills for people with learning disabilities
• Scileanna sóisialta do dhaoine atá faoi mhíchumas foghlama
There may be a small charge for transport and meals provided by day centres
D'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh táille bheag le n-íoc as costais iompair agus béilte in ionaid lae
Usually people are referred to day centres or day care services by their family doctor (GP) or their public health nurse
De ghnáth is iad Liachleachtóirí Ginearálta nó banaltraí sláinte phoiblí a chuireann daoine ar aghaidh chuig ionaid lae nó seirbhísí cúram lae
People with intellectual disabilities or autism may be recommended for attendance at day services after an assessment of need
D'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh sé molta do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas intleachtúil nó daoine a bhfuil uathachas orthu freastal ar sheirbhísí lae tar éis measúnaithe a dhéanamh ar a riachtanais
